reviewText: The quiz was locked

the certificate does not contain the hours spent to complete the course. What good is a certificate that can not be proven how many hours it is worth? This is not for University, it is for people to use in their curricula and at work, as we will be able to use if it does not have how many hours it is worth. This is ridiculous absurdity, typical of countries where people live out of the global reality.

I am very unhappy about the Course Certificate for the following reasons : it doesn't state what subjects have been covered, it doesn't mention the hours of study involved. The certificate has a worthless appearance. In comparison I had a very good MOOC Statement of Accomplishment from the university EPFL which I can send to you if you are interested in making any improvements. jack.fairgrieve@gmail.com
interesting course. However it was not very straightforward. In the future please clarify what's being taught and make the quiz  questions consistently what being shown in the lectures.
The concepts were very clear, but this course only talks about MDGs, which were completed in 2015. This is 2023, and the course must talk about SDGs in the place of MDGs.
Some course content are not updated (links not working). Very few people in discussions. Didn't see TAs. I had some questions on the forum but not answered.

I very much enjoyed this course. I only wish I could get a copy of the refereces used in each lecture. I briefly notice at the end of a lecture a slide but it quickly disappeared. Additionally, the WHO sites have been updated and links are no longer operational. Thank you!M Pribulick

I believe that the course needs updating. Several 'hot links' are not operable and lecturers quoting studies that are over ten years old are not helpful.Overall, I did enjoy the content and look forward to more study in this Public Health area. Thank you
It is a very interesting course. It would need  more recent updates of some modules, especially after Covid19 pandemic has developed as a big global health challenge.
Excellent course
Great course content. Very enlightening and educating, just that the researches are now outdated in 2020. Thanks
Really enlightening
The course was very informative and covered many aspects.
well presented course, very informative, highly recommended for an absolute well structured introduction about the global health.

Excelente curso, por el momento solo disponible en inglés tanto para audio como para subtítulos, sin embargo al ser un contenido técnico en la mayor parte se puede seguir de forma sencilla con un nivel intermedio del idioma.Los ponentes ofrecen una perspectiva amplia y muy buena de los retos y temáticas que atañen a la salud global en el siglo XXI, así como las múltiples estrategias y enfoques que se han utilizado para abordar estas problemáticas de salud, que se hacen cada vez más complejas e intersectoriales.Es un curso que vale la pena, el único pero es que esta ligeramente desactualizado, quizás un par de años, por lo que parte de la estadística y datos son obsoletos, sin embargo, proporciona elementos para poder abordar los reportes globales más recientes y poder auto-actualizar el curso.Ampliamente recomendado, muchas gracias.

The content is very useful to know/read contextual introduction to burden of disease globally. It gives insights to learn and explore burden of CDs and NCDs in cross continental fashion. Useful to those who keen interested to have introductory knowledge in global health.
Very informative and educational course about global health.
I cannot pay for the certificate and recieve the certificate even after completing this wonderful course.
The topics are really interesting and there are great presentations and teachers. I recommend strongly to start learning on global health
Somethings should be updated to newer developments or files published by the UN. Great course overall! I really enjoyed it and it was the perfect pace/amount of work.

I really enjoyed the course for the broad-based coverage of the multiple aspects of global health. The format of the course is also very engaging with multiple different experts covering their individual areas by means of short lectures and interviews. As a trained life sciences professional, I was particularly interested in the social and policy/diplomacy aspects of public health and this course provided me with a good exposure to the basics as well as access to more in-depth resources. My only suggestion for improving the course further would be to update the course material as a lot of the suggested reading content regarding directives, WHO reports, etc. are now almost 5 years old.
It was a great experience i loved it
It covers many different topics and points of view, but it's data are not up to date (as of 2018).
muy buen curso,excelentes clases, excelentes docentes
great introduction!
Good course with minute details on some of key aspects. recommended for beginners to expert, across levels.
Nice update of many relevant aspects involved in global health.
Really explanatory lectures on Global Health, needed for health care professionals
extrema importância  para diversas áreas do conhecimento
Not always as up to date as could be. Overall very nice overview of the different aspects of Global Health. Good course!
A very informational course. Gives a good overview of the concept. Only if they add recent developments and updates on infectious diseases like Zika and Ebola, it would be great.
Very interesting and insightful, with a broad range of topics. Thank you!
A great overview to Global Health - though a bit dated. Still largely refers to MDGs and all....

I really enjoyed this course as it was an interesting blend of lectures, readings with practice quizzes and case studies. It gave me an overall understanding of the global health issues and I will refer to it whenever I need a revision.
Very good initial overview on Global Health

Me pareció un muy buen curso, excelente la información gran calidad de vídeos, el unico inconveniente que tuve es con algunos vídeos y la falta de subtitulo en español, pero lo demás es muy buen materia..!
Quite enlightening!
Poderia ter a legenda em portugues, facilitaria a compreensão do conteúdo.

I am glad and fortunate that I have joined the course. Thank you for clearing my doubts and reshaping my skills and knowledge regarding Global Health. I have learnt various sociodemographic characteristics affecting health within a community. Also, it deepens my knowledge in the field of Communicable and Non-Communicable Diseases and their Global burden.
Excellent course content and course design. Thank you
this course was a very beneficial course which i have benefited a lot, i will apply my field of work what i have learnt
Absolutely fitting my field of interests, thу number and quality of the lecturers, the topics covered. Highly recommend!
I have really enjoyed the course, it become an add plus in my knowledge related to health issues.

very interesting course; touching upon most of main topics that have a direct/indirect relation with global health; relevant to re-thinking health with an multidisciplinary vision and integrated approach

I​ always had difficulty to understand why Global Health is given the name Global health. This course cleared it for me. I would also love to thank the lecturers for the dedication they should in sharing their knowledge with others. Thank you
I loved this course!The lecturers were knowladgeable and engaging.There was a wide variety of topics not only on medicine but also relative to the social framework .

I am glad I decided to enroll for this study. Top instructors from around the globe, up-to-date data provided, Interview with relevant organization representatives. Excellent course content. I learnt a lot. Thank you University of Copenhagen, thank you Coursera.
Muito obrigada pelo curso maravilhoso! Eu amei aprender e espero trazer o retorno em breve!
Great introduction to Global Health!
very good content

This course provided me with an overview of most daily global health challenges. I gained an insight into how these challenges have changed over time, the possible determinants of such changes, and international strategies necessary for preparedness against future occurrences. I am very thankful to Coursera team members and University of Copenhagen for this unique opportunity. I am very keen to get involved.

This is a very well presented introduction to Global health.  The instructors are all very knowledgeable and the presentations were clear, easy to understand and they had very good illustrations. The course topics were elaborate and the reading materials very relevant.  Although some sites failed to open.  This course makes the disease burden very easy to understand and the evolution of the strategies to tackle the problems is demonstrated very well.   it has challenged me to look out for more knowledge and to start advocacy for especially tobacco use, Early marriage and teen pregnancy, NCDs, and environmental protection.  The video on school of Husbands should be shared to more communities because when the men get involved in the health care  of their families, their communities health and well being will improve.  The flow  of the lectures was smooth from introduction and ending with Governance issues.  Thank you for this great course.

A broad and comprehensive approach to Global Health and its main topics: Infectious and Non Communicable diseases, maternal and child health, environment, food, water and lastly, health systems and governance, detrimental to comprehend and assess healthcare worldwide.An enriching view with participation of a dozen researchers and professors that, although has some lenghty videos that could be shortened and is somewhat dated (reporting to the millennium development goals before 2015), offers a substantial overview of global health.
Um curso excelente!!
An excellent introduction to this fascinating field.
Great introduction to global health!
A broad view of Global Health, I highly recommend this class.

This course was a great introduction on the topic of global health. It has motivated me to learn more about the topic. The resources have been invaluable and is something that I will return to further my knowledge.
very informative albeit quite complex
Excellent Course.
A lot of useful information. Good examples of case studies.
The best online course ever. Very interesting, engaging and insightful if you have no previous knowledge on Global Health. It allows you to learn about very different topics.

This course is very interesting  and very interactive too. I particularly liked the 'health in all policies' proposition. This is practical and feasible proposition which will help countries save money. I wish  my countrymen in Malawi take this   proposition on board when designing policies.
A good course detail with incredible lecturer, i loved the course thank you all!
A great, yet thorough introduction to the subject Global Health. Level of complexity is well adjusted and you will achieve analytic, evaluative skills along knowledge on the main subject area.
Strongly recommended for persons interested in learning about public and global health

I really enjoyed this course! As a veterinary student, it gave me a better idea of what to do after my graduation, especially thanks to the lessons of professor Ib Bygbjerg, which have really inspired me. At the same time, I would suggest this course also to people who want to better understand what is happening around the world, attending these lessons as a documentary of the major issues of global health, both in the developed world but especially in developing countries.Thanks also to professor Flemming Konradsen for the organization of this course and for his interesting interviews to professionals around the world.Ready to attend other online courses issued by the University of Copenhagen and hopefully in the next future I'll be able to join a master there.
excellent
It's very helpful to improve our knowledge. So I'd like to request to continue this.Thank you.

reviewText: best
a well-organized course with both comprehensive view on global health challenges and very in-depth case study on the best practices presented by various countries, NGO and academia.
Great learning course

I thoroughly enjoyed this course and have gained a lot of insight and knowledge around Global Health. It has confirmed that this is something I would love to study for further in the near future and I would like to complete my 4th year of Bachelors in Public Health, complete my degree and move on to my Master’s degree in Public/Global Heath.

This course has opened my eyes as a clinician, i no longer think about the diseases or treatment. I now go beyond and think about other factors that may alter the outcome of the care I am providing to to my patients. It has thus been very helpful and I am glad I've got lucky to pass here.

This was a really well tailored course showcasing on how many factors play a crucial role in the aspects of health and health systems and policies on a local,national and global level.I would like to thank all the instructors who have taken their time in imparting their knowledge in dealing with various aspects of the course.
The course was very informative. I personally got to know many different things about various diseases and how they are tackled all around the world
These 7 weeks were worth it and very intense. Glad to have learnt new things in global Health.
It was interesting and useful. And I appreciate to everyone who put him/her energy to that. Thank you! Waiting for new videos and courses.
It was and complete course and I learned a lot
Fully insightful and gain new perspectives

I found this course really interesting. This course is like a window opening to see the vast arena of the world's health sector. Came to know about health problems & solutions in different countries. Learned about health frameworks & collaborations of global with local frameworks. It covered a vast area of health-related knowledge.  Hope to learn more.
I loved this course, that help me a lot, thank you!
It was so simple to learn and presentation were exceptionally good, felt as if I am in a class. Exceptionally good.
This was an excellent course giving a good insight into such a relevant topic.
i am really happy after doing this course this is worth of time they provide really good teachers and work
Good for Public Health Students and professionals, Few topic and materials are outdated.

This course provides an insight into how global health can be a determining factor in providing health equity for people all across the globe. Globalization and urbanization will help us provide better healthcare in the future. Very helpful course.

This course really broadened my mind on so many aspects of Global Health, it is so useful and I shall apply them at professional and personal levels. I will definitely take more courses in this field. Thank you, Coursera for the knowledge especially in this lockdown period of the COVID-19

This is a too good course to know the very basic of global health and public health system in the world. I loved this course and know lot of new things and ideas from that. It also create some new ideas in my mind hopefully i will wrok on that.
I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to get started with global health.
A very comprehensive course touching upon many aspects of the Global Health Landscape, challenges, barriers, solutions.

This course has provided fundamental insights into the vast topic of Global Health. It is especially helpful to those without prior established knowledge of the field and is relayed in a structured, easy to understand concept.

perfect start to understand the true meaning of public health

I'm in week 5 and I love this course. It is an excellent supplement to my masters in Health and Life Science Analytics and a great refresher an upcoming PhD in Global Health.  You will learn about many facets of global health from many experts in the field. The videos are interesting, and the quizzes are very good and challenge the student.

high quality, super interesting interviews

This is one of the most fantastic courses I have been attended. It covers a full package of outstanding health challenges facing the world today, some are of my special interests. The suggested materials are diverse and include visualized reports to better understanding of current situations.

I would definitely recommend this course. It presents material in a clear and engaging fashion, providing many resources for continued individual learning. The expertise of guest lecturers and stories regarding their multiple experiences was also appreciated. This was my first global health course experience but I will definitely continue to seek additional learning opportunities regarding public health and how to serve the community and my patients. Thank you for the opportunity to take this course!
